评论详情: Really pretty and true to size. 5’0, 125pds, 34C.

评论概述: Not even close to the right color
评论详情: I like the dress, but I ordered dark green and it came as an olive green. I will be returning.
There were tears in dress and wrinkles wouldn't release.

ordered this dress for a wedding and i am so excited to wear it!!! the quality is so silky and feels elegant and not cheap. very light and not see through. tying the knot in the front was very easy. for reference i got a small and am 5’0 and 119lbs!
Wore this for my friends rehearsal dinner and it was perfect. Great length (I’m 5’8”) and color was stunning. Got lots of compliments on it
I got so many compliments about the dress. It's great for beach nights. I didn't have to worry about a nip slip

I bought this in this color and green. It is extremely flattering and classy. I have worn it in the fall with a jacket and in the summer. I am not a small girl and it fits and looks amazing on. I highly recommend.
Fits well Exactly like in picture
This is a great dress; soft and satiny. Beautiful print, and a nice fit. And fantastic price.

Bought this dress to wear for my friends birthday. It fit perfectly. I’m 5’7” and 132 lbs. I bought a medium. The color was nice. It flowed nicely and was easy to wear. The fabric did not cling to my body. I kept getting compliments and people asking where I bought this dress.
Beautiful color, good material, fit to misshapen cut
I love everything about this dress, fit great, silky feeling, love the slit!!! I would order in every color!!!

This is my favorite dress I own. It’s so flattering. I’m a 2x and this material looks elegant but doesn’t hug in the wrong spots. I do recommend using a steamer on it upon arrival. But other than that I love it. You can tie the top to fit your breasts. I am a DD.
Super cute! Perfect length and the way it ties is perfect for every “body type.” It does come wrinkled but that’s expected. Needs a good wash and hang dry before wearing.
Great quality, beautiful, I will be ordering a second in another color! True to size, 5'2'' 135lb ordered a Medium
This dress was perfect. I just decided to wear something else for my event.

This dress is so comfortable! I was worried it may look cheap, but the poly material gives silky vibes. Wore it for a semi-formal wedding in the fall with booties and can't wait to wear it again. I was able to wear it without a bra so that's a huge plus for me. The back has some stretch at the top so you can move comfortably. I'm 5'4" and 125 and the x-small fit me perfectly.

I bought this dress for my old roommates wedding. Tried it on and it fit great, not even a week later traveled with it and put it on literally 30 minutes before the wedding was supposed to start and there's a huge rip underneath the chest area. I'm so glad I bought a back up dress but this dress makes me nervous to keep even if I did try to sew and fix it. I love the style and the print, but I'd be very cautious and weary to purchase the dress because of the quality

It's adorable. I'm usually a small, but the medium looks so much better on me! (Length is better and the middle section stands out more :)). I'm not done up here (no makeup) and the dress still looks good! Takin it to a wedding.

I thought the dress in a medium and the dark green color. For reference, I usually wear a size M and am 5'-8", 145lbs. Fit was very true to size and the tie-front makes it adjustable to however much room you need for your chest. Straps are adjustable as well. The material is nice and flowy with a satin look - there were some wrinkles from it being folded in the package but they steamed out very easily and has not wrinkled hanging in my closet since.

I recently purchased this tie front satin dress for my vacation in Cartagena, Colombia, and it was an absolute game-changer! Not only is it incredibly comfortable, but the satin material felt cool against my skin in the hot and humid weather of Cartagena.  The tie front detail added a sexy and stylish touch to the dress, making it versatile for both daytime exploring and evening dinners. I received so many compliments while wearing it, and it made me feel confident and chic during my entire trip.  If you're looking for a dress that can keep you comfortable, stylish, and cool, this dress is an absolute must-have. Highly recommended!

评论概述: Not for people with medium to large breasts
评论详情: I tried to make this work but the straps were too short, there was not much room to adjust  This also does not seem to be a style that works with people with B or greater cups. It looked very weird
Bought this dress for an engagement party and it is so pretty! Really happy with style, fit, and color.
Obsessed. Fits perfectly. Easy to adjust.
Well made, beautiful color, fit great and as a postpartum nursing mom the tie top was so convenient for nursing! I got so many compliments.

I ordered this last minute for a wedding. The color is accurate in person, but the material is quite thin. It wasn't see through, but the more you inspect the dress the cheaper you can see it is.  Length on me (5'1") came to just above ankle. I didn't have as big of a front tie gap as the product picture, but that's ok (fit my C cups just fine). Thankfully it was on sale when I purchased as there is no way I would pay full price for the quality I received. Overall, I still received compliments and will wear it again.
Wore this to a wedding and got so many compliments. Flattering, great fit, pretty color and pattern. It does wrinkle easily, but it wasn’t a huge deal.

评论概述: One of the most unflattering dresses I've ever tried on
评论详情: I didn't have super high expectations on this dress but I didn't expect it to be so bad. Very cheap material and is very prone to wrinkles. I didn't find that it gave a flattering fit but maybe it's just how it sat on me. The way the back tightened and with the front loose it was hard to tie it exactly how I wanted. I managed to get it looking okay from the front but from the side it looked like a maternity dress which certainly isnt what I was going for.
I didnt Use it I bought It for a wedding and thought it looked too cheap. I just Did not return it in time it was never used
I’m 5’11 and 150lbs, I ordered a small and it fits perfectly! It’s very light weight so it was perfect for the beach wedding I attended. Love the tie in the middle too.

评论概述: Hard to cover large bust DDD
评论详情: I’m a DDD if you’re looking for something modest and have larger breast than this isn’t for you. Some lower cleavage ( under boob ) will show. Otherwise fabric is typical off brand Amazon quality…. Not the worst quality not the best quality. I’m 5 3” I typically wear a size 4 or 25 jeans or pants a medium to large top and size 34 DDD bra. I bought a size medium in this dress. The back top is sewn with a slightly stretchy give that allows it to fit larger bust.
It’s a beautiful dress. i think it looks expensive. It was true to size for me and is great for warm weather. I wore a bandeau underneath but may not have really needed to.
He sizing is perfect and the color is gorgeous!
Love this dress! Fit perfectly. Wore it at a wedding and got so many compliments!

评论概述: Cute but arrived with hole in fabric
评论详情: I wanted to give this dress 5 stars because it was super cute, however it came ripped (decent hole on the side of the fabric) and as a last minute wedding dress order I had no choice but to throw a quick stitch in it and still wear it!

评论概述: Perfect fit and soft silky material!
评论详情: I’m 40, 5’3” and 130lbs. The medium fits me perfectly!  Love the material!  It is a bit more revealing than I normally like but I wanted something still modest but with a little reveal and this dress is just that for me.
Material feels very cheap, unfortunately had to return.
Definitely pretty and looks like the pic. There is no stretch in the fabric at all so make sure you get the correct size.
I haven’t bought clothes for a while bc I feel fat, but I got this dress and I love it. I feel beautiful and sexy. Size Large

As someone who has worn this dress at 117 lbs and 128 pounds, I feel like this dress is flattering and so comfortable. The tie at the chest makes it easy to customize for weeks where you are heavier or lighter. I would stay away from the versions of this dress that have large areas of solid color as I have the green one and it shows any water drops that land on it.  They wash out by just doing a quick hand rinse of the whole dress in the sink, but that’s still annoying.  The dress with the full pattern (I have the one with the orange and blue leaves and the blue with blue leaves) is better for hiding those droplets. You will want to steam it every time before you wear it. Overall a great buy - I now have it in 3 colors and get compliments every time I wear it. 5’1” 117-128 lbs.

I have PCOS so all my weight is literally in my belly area and this dress made my body look so flattering. The quality was very nice for the price and the slit isn’t too high or too low. Also great for busting moves on the dance floor. I loved it so much I bought another one in a different color and will probably buy another one after that.  Just for more clarity I’m 5’5”, 185lbs, 36DDD and the girls stayed in place nicely!

I'm 5'2 150lbs with a 34F bra size and I bought an M. It fit great except for the bust area. There was no way I would be able to wear this dress where my bra wasn't visibly shown no matter how I tie it. Sadly returning.
I love that I can adjust the tie in the front to fit my bust with or without a bra. Super comfy. It did come super wrinkled so I had to steam it but after it was steamed, it looked so wonderful!

Wife bought this for a wedding, one of the best purchases. Got compliments on it all night, mentioned how comfortable & good it made her feel. She looked stunning. 10000000% recommend. She ordered a large.

I knew there was a pocket that was a little revealing but if you're a size 14US it's VERY revealing. There is no getting around your whole underboob being out. Fabric was light and otherwise it fit very well.
such a pretty color!  fit true to size but sadly it didn't look as good on me as the model.
This dress shipped quick and fits beautifully! True to size.

This dress is super adorable and comfy, true to size. Love the satin feel. However I don’t believe it’s fully worth the price for the material. BUT it’s adorable and worked perfect for what I needed it!

5'3" 115 lbs - Ordered a size XS, and it fit perfectly. I carry all my weight in my bottom half and have a small chest, so if you have a bigger chest I would size up. There is a lot of room for "flow" on the bottom, but the top seems to have less room for error. I loved this dress, I was able to dance all night at a wedding I attended. I am going to order a different color for a wedding I am attending very soon, that's how much I loved it!!
Poor quality. Both sides ripped after I wore this once. To a winery. Just sitting and sipping occurred. I’m glad I didn’t wear it dancing, it might have ripped all the way off.

I’d say this is decent quality for the price. It’s not see through and ssits nicely and has nice flow, but it is kind of thin. I wore this to a wedding and got lots of compliments. I’m 2 month postpartum and this dress made me feel confident and pretty! I recommend.

I love this dress so much! I bought it originally a few months back for a vacation and returned it because I didn't end up needing it, but it stuck in the back of my mind. I had another event came up recently, and I jumped at the opportunity to get this dress and actually put it to use. It is a great shape, and it is so flattering. The material is light and worked great for a Florida night. This is definitely one of my new favorite dresses and I'm so glad I found it.
The dress fit as to be expected, very nice material and very happy with the product.
I personally love it! 💜💜 Wore the dress to a friend’s wedding. I’m 117 lbs- 120 lbs, 4’11! I got X-small.

评论概述: Xl large is you weight 183 and are 5'4
评论详情: I likes the material er nice looking fit really nice sexy .I loved it

This dress is very cute and fits nicely, but the material is very cheap. It had tears/snags in it within the first hour of wearing it. The material is also very thin. If I had known this about the material, I would have gone with another option seeing as it wasn’t a cheap price for a dress.

评论概述: Perfect for a wedding guest dress!
评论详情: Very comfortable and the material is silk which is nice. I am 5'4" and weigh 125 lbs. I ordered a small which fits snug as a glove. I put this in the refresh cycle of my dryer and all the wrinkles came out!
If I could give zero stars I would. The dress was used and there was a gross food stain by the neckline.
Didn’t fit in the chest and came with stitching coming out in the front also so unable to even wear. Didn’t get it returned in time so stuck with this useless dress.

I wanted to love this dress so much. The color is so beautiful. But is so poorly built. The bottom part was really beautiful, but the top was terrible. I have read so many reviews saying that it is a good dress for people with bigger breasts, but it didn't work at all for me - a 38D size. It looked so weird. The bow straps were short and also the shoulder straps were built in a terrible way that created an extra fold parallel to my armpits, like an extra fabric right there. Not to mention that the shoulder straps were very close to my neck, making this weird neck/chest shape. I returned it asap.
I loved this dress. I got a Large and I weigh 160 lbs 5'3".

I ordered this dress in dark green and army green both in the same size. The dark green color fit perfectly. The army green color was way too big around the stomach. Once I tied the dress it left a large gap, which. tried to cover with the material from tying the top of the dress. I was able to make it work, but disappointed that the dress sizes fit differently based off the color ordered.

I got this for a wedding in October and it’s perfect. I’m about 5’2, 115 lbs and I got an XS! The length is perfect and hits me about mid calf, the slit hits about mid thigh but it shouldn’t be any issue. I’m a 32b and tying the top tight DOES give me a little bit more under boob than I had expected but I can tie it in a way that hides it a bit. I’ll definitely be purchasing in another color for some events I have next year!
Loved this for an early fall wedding! I got lots of compliments! I ordered both the medium and large and they fit about the same so I kept the large!

This dress is perfect to wear as a guest to wedding. In fact, another guest also had this dress in a different pattern! (see photo) And I think we both looked great. I'm 5'7" and 120 lbs, I got the small. Also, having a smaller chest, I was able to go without a bra, and felt comfortable and supported by the way I tied it.
Love the fabric. Nice and light but felt quality and not see through. Felt great wearing it all night at a wedding and got tons of compliments.

The material and dress are great, but the fabric where the boob's go is so far apart you can see EVERYTHING. It's crazy. I don't even have big boobs - Bs. Missed my return window too so that sucks a lot.

评论概述: Fit perfect, nice material and comfortable!
评论详情: This fit perfect and was true to size. I wear a large. The material was soft and not all wrinkled up and looked very nice. Wore dress to a wedding. I am skeptical about buying clothes on Amazon because you never know what you are going to get. I am extremely pleased!!
I love this dress

I was having a hard time finding a dress as a guess for a wedding that was classy, fitted to my body, but still sexy. I love that this can discreetly show me figure with also hiding my little pooch lol got a lot of compliments!
True to size - I ordered my normal size. Very pretty fabric and flattering cut.
Worked great, and comfortable for wedding i attended

First of all, get the dress. It looks great, it’s comfortable, it’s a good price, and makes your boobs look good.  It is cheaper quality, but it wasn’t crap. Great for vacation, weddings, nice dinners out. Definitely needs to be air dried and steamed.

评论概述: Lové this dress though had it adjusted .
评论详情: Lové this dress but had to have it adjusted fir a dd chest .
I wear an XL and this dress was so flattering! I got a bunch of compliments on it. The fabric was nice and breathable and super comfy.

Absolutely love this dress! I wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments. The material is thin but comfortable and not see through at all. The chest area comes fully untied so you can tighten or loosen it as needed for the best fit. I ordered it in small and extra small and both fit well.

评论概述: Cute dress too bad it was ripped...
评论详情: Dress came and it fit perfectly, felt great on. As i slid my hand down, i realized on the dress pining there was a whole, and what could possibly have been fabric crazy glue? Returned it for a new one.
This looks amazing on and fits so nicely. Fits well with bigger chests and curvier body types
I didn’t realize from the photos that the whole in the front of the dress actually exposes under boob. Not the look I was personally going for. The dress overall fit well and was flattering.

I really wanted to like this dress but it just fell short. I really liked the color and pattern, and the fabric felt nice and had some stretch to it. My biggest issue was the tied top. It kinda smashed my boobs and gave them a weird shape. Maybe with the right kind of bra it could work.

评论概述: Beautiful but not for big chested ladies!
评论详情: I really liked it but It didn’t hold my girls at all
Not the most flattering. Fabric is off
Dress up for a night out. Dress down for lunch. Very classy and stylish. Fits great true to size. I bought for an outdoor barn wedding this fall pairing with Jean jacket and platform heels.
I worse this to my friends wedding — it was an outdoor venue. Very breathable and cute! I received multiple compliments. It held up after washing as well.

I bought this for my Italy trip and it fit perfectly. I love the material and not only is it flattering and beautiful, it also is super comfy. Just know before buying it, a bra won’t work for it (even strapless) because of the way the top part of the dress is. But it is worth getting if you can see yourself wearing it without a bra. I bought a size medium.
This dress is light weight and silky, it looks just like the picture. Perfect for smaller chested ladies.

Absolutely loved this dress! It was a little small in the chest so I had to size up from a 2Xl to a 3Xl I’m a 40G for reference, and had to wear a bralette but got so many compliments! It was really flattering on my body and as curvy girl that can be hard to find.

评论概述: Do not go a size up
评论详情: Dresses usually fit me small on the bust (38ddd). Me thinking going up a size would give me enough fabric to tighten. It ended up being too much. The way the bow straps are cut out upward and my boobs being teardrop just made for a weird combo. I tried wearing a bra, and eventually tried tape. Had too much material in the sides. But I just couldn’t get it to work. I will order in a smaller size. Fabric was nice, silky. Color was spot on the picture. Overall liked it, I just made a mistake on size.

Wore this for a wedding and ended up buying in another print color because I loved it so much. It’s definitely  light cheaper fabric but you can’t tell once it’s on, I ironed it inside out and it was totally fine as well. Took a few attempts to get the chest area tied to keep the girls in because i have a larger chest but they were in tact all night even in the dance floor.

I was so hesitant to buy but I’m so happy that I did! This color and the dress itself worked perfectly for a hot, country, Tennessee wedding! Kept me comfortable all night!! I actually brought two. This and the tealish color one which I’ll be wearing to a fall wedding coming up. I’m 5’4”, weigh about 145ish give or take lol and brought this dress in a Large!
This dress wasn’t a fit for me not flattering.
Slit was in the middle and showed entire vag. Yikes. I’m only 5’3
Wore to a wedding in Cancun. Got tons of compliments. I’m 5’3”, 127lbs, 32DD and got the small. It’s perfect for a semi formal, beachy event.

评论概述: Perfect Summer Dress - Comfortable and Stylish!
评论详情: I absolutely love this dress! The vibrant floral pattern and flattering fit make it perfect for any summer occasion. The material is lightweight and breathable, keeping me cool even on the hottest days. I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable it is; the fabric has just the right amount of stretch, and the adjustable straps ensure a perfect fit.  The length is just right, falling below the knee, and the slit adds a touch of elegance without being too revealing. Whether I'm heading out for a casual day or dressing it up for a night out, this dress never disappoints. I've received so many compliments every time I wear it!  If you're looking for a versatile, comfortable, and stylish summer dress, I highly recommend giving this one a try!
Ordered this dress for a fall ranch wedding in Oregon and it’s gorgeous and flattering!
Bought for a wedding I wasn’t in that my husband was. Their suits were tan with terracotta accents and this dress was gorgeous with it.

I returned this because I hate trying on garments that clearly someone ALREADY wore and took advantage of Amazon's loose return policy.  It smelled nauseating.  I hate chemical-perfumed detergents and am germaphobic so getting a garment smelling like a cheap discounted fabreeze softener with no tags indicates to me someone wore this and then decided it served its purpose and wanted to return it within it's time window. Gross.  Trying this on made me hurl, but as for the fit, it's actually rather nice and the size chart is correct. It's just a shame bc the previous person also stretched it out (not to be judgmental, but I am) the bust would have fit lovely if the armpit area wasn't stretched and ruined. Knocking a star for re-selling a ruined garment and for sanitary reasons.

This dress is super flattering! I wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments! It’s a faux-satin fabric and lays very nicely.  The only issue I had with it was the armpit fabric was too big and flared out a bit, but this wasn’t a big deal. Very happy with this purchase!
Love the color, style and fit. Comfortable!
Wore this to a wedding and it was very breathable. Love the fabric. Not transparent. Light weight.
